doc.previous: Aircraft maintenance is split between two wholly owned subsidiaries: Condor Technik GmbH (based at Frankfurt Airport with 160 employees) for the medium-long haul Boeing aircraft, and Condor Berlin (based at Berlin SchÃ¶nefeld Airport with 80 employees) for the short-medium haul Airbus aircraft.
